Module com.example.projetconceptionlogicielle
Package com.example.projetconceptionlogicielle.UNO_GUI

Class GameGUI

java.lang.Object
com.example.projetconceptionlogicielle.UNO_GUI.GameGUI
Direct Known Subclasses:
ClientGUI, ConnectionGUI, GameParametersGUI, MenuGUI, ServerGUI
public abstract class GameGUI extends Object
Interface setting the conditions for the use of the GUI classes in this package.
